an5.60:4.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito.
an5.60:4.3: Dullabho, bhikkhave, vuḍḍhapabbajito suvaco, dullabho suggahitaggāhī, dullabho padakkhiṇaggāhī, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo.
an5.60:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito”ti.
